task.title: How to Configure an eXist Data Source

context.p: The latest instructions on how to configure eXist support in can be found on our website.
The latest instructions on how to configure eXist support in can be found on our website.
supports eXist database server versions 1.3, 1.4 and 1.5.

step.cmd: Select eXist from the Driver type combo box.
Press the Add button to add the eXist driver files.

info.p: The following driver files should be added in the dialog box for setting up the eXist datasource. They are found in the installation directory of the eXist database server. Please make sure you copy the files from the installation of the eXist server where you want to connect from Oxygen.
info.note:
For eXist database server version 1.5 and 2.0, the following driver files must also be added in the dialog box for setting up the datasource:
lib/core/slf4j-api-1.x.x.jar
lib/core/slf4j-log4j12-1.x.x.jar
info.p: The version number from the driver file names may be different for your eXist server installation.

step.cmd: Click the OK button to finish the connection configuration.
step.info: To watch our video demonstration about running XQuery against an eXist XML database, go to http://www.oxygenxml.com/demo/eXist_Database.html.
